A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was unexpected\, thrilling\, and amazing.  I felt like a little kid watching the original Star Wars all over again in the theater.  I don't understand the hardcore fans like myself\, who are blasting this movie.  Do you want to see the same stuff over and over\, or be surprised?  Star Wars needs to reinvent itself a little to keep things fresh\, while still maintaining what we love about it\, which I fully believe The Last Jedi did.
